title: How are paytm customer services? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hell bad, they dont reply in time and even if you receive any response most of the time it would be a generic copy paste mail. "We are looking into this.." or "Thank you for your patience and sorry for the inconvenience caused.." but they hardly provide any solution to your problem. I have discovered a new way to get faster responses by using twitter and tag @vijayshekhar (CEO of Paytm) @paytmcare in your tweet. Atleast you will observe some action from their side.
